titleStmt.title: Our sauiours iourney to the Gadarens: or the loue of Christ vnto man. Written by I. Iones Bachelour in Diuinity, and parson of S. Nicholas Acons, London
titleStmt.author: Jones, John, 1574 or 5-1636.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Nicholas Okes, for Henry Bel, and are to bee sold at his shop hard without Bishops-gate,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Christs loue to man.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
